name: iron
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases Defense effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Raises the stat DEFENSE of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: Raises the base DEFENSE stat of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A nutritious drink for POKéMON. It raises the base DEFENSE stat of one POKéMON.
